AreYouSureYouWantToRemove: Are you sure you want to remove the following {1}?

Convert.Label: Convert inherited permissions on this object into explicit permissions
Convert.Tooltip: Permission for this level will be converted to explicit permissions. New users/groups will not inherit from parent.

Remove.Label: Remove all inherited permissions from this object
Remove.Tooltip: All permissions inherited from the parent level will be removed for this level. New users/groups will not inherit permissions from the parent.

EnableInheritance.Restore: Inherit all permissions from parent and override any definition manually made at this level
EnableInheritance.Keep: Inherit all permissions from parent but keep definitions manually made at this level

nameValidationInstruction: User and group names can contain all Unicode characters except for the following characters: Forward slash (/), Left square bracket ([), Right square bracket (]), Colon (:), Semicolon (;), Vertical bar (|), Equal sign (=), Plus sign (+), Asterisk (*), Question mark (?), Left angle bracket (<), Right angle bracket (>), Double quote (")
samlNameValidationInstruction: User and group names can contain any Unicode character up to 255 characters
GetEffectivePermissions_Tooltip:
You can also enter the name of a user not listed here if the user is part of a group, in the following format:
NetBIOS_name\user (e.g.: DEV\John)
machine_name\local_user (e.g.: re2008r2js1\JohnMil1)

SaveChangesPopup.Body: Do you want to save user permissions changes?

DisabledDeleteBtnTooltip: This option is only available for user/group that do not inherit permission from a parent
DisabledRestoreBtnTooltip: This option in only available for user/group that inherit permission from a parent
